# Council President Kayla Paulsen

Kayla was born and raised in McMinnville, Oregon. When she is not in the office or courtroom, Kayla spends time with her teenage daughter, enjoys wines of the Willamette Valley, and loves taking in sporting events. She is a dedicated mother and traveler while also utilizing her spare time for public service. Kayla has served as a City Councilor for the City of Lafayette since 2018 and is the current City Council President. 

 

 

*Councilor Paulsen's term ends on December 31, 2028.*

 

**COMMITTEE LIASION ASSIGNMENTS:**

***Budget Committee Member***

***Lafayette Downtown Association (LDA) Ex-Officio***
